summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons inmate housing record for Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his cell/bed assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019. The document was generated on June 22, 2021, and shows his final recorded location was in Housing Unit Z, Range 04, Bed 206L AD.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein

events.title: Epstein's Initial Housing Assignment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is recorded as being assigned to House R, Range 01, Bed 001L at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Epstein's Final Recorded Housing
events.description: The record shows Epstein's final assignment was to House Z, Range 04, Bed 206L AD at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, with a stop time of 07:47 on August 10, 2019.

keyFacts: This document is an official Bureau of Prisons record detailing Jeffrey Epstein's housing assignments during his incarceration at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Epstein was moved between at least six different cell/bed locations within the MCC over a period of approximately five weeks from July 6 to August 10, 2019.
The record shows Epstein's final assignment was to House Z, Range 04, Bed 206L AD, with a stop time recorded as 07:47 on August 10, 2019, the day he was found dead in his cell.
The document was generated on June 22, 2021, nearly two years after Epstein's death, suggesting it was created as part of a records request or investigation.
